The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 January is 2,394,923 (4,254.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 December, there were 307,806 new confirmed cases (546.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 December, there were 232,142 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 33% (75,664 extra cases).
